74282.summary: Some customers in the Waneta Junction area of Trail are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
74282.title: Mar 17 - Trail (Waneta Junction) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
